name: Searching Among My Ten Second Loves
name_original: Searching Among My Ten Second Loves
description:
Scour the pages describing your ten lovers, try and choose who the real one is. Discern between fiction and reality in this intricate game of riddles!

Play in Fullscreen Mode

Remember!

1. 🌑 New Moon

2. 🌒Waxing Moon

3. 🌕 Full Moon

4. 🌔 Waning Moon

Fernando Gueler Berdasco - Game Developer

Manuel Burrell - Narrative Designer
